title: What was the best and worst song of 2014?

replies.body: Worst: Everyone Miley Cyrus, 1Direction, and all the boy bands RefusetoSink like were the worst

replies.body:
Best: Bustre - Shadow
Worst: Anaconda
replies.body_tagged:
Best: Bustre - Shadow
Worst: Anaconda

replies.body:
Anaconda is a honorable mention for me, there was a lot worse garbage out there, in the honorable mentions it's low; the highest being We Dem Boyz, No Flex Zone, Jealous, and Rude.

We Dem Boyz
Lyrics are just terrible and that's all I got to say. The whole song is a disgrace. Also I can see that you are boys and very f*cking loud. Screw off.
No Flex Zone
If you do not like We Dem Boyz there is no way on hell you like this.
Jealous
What the hell do you get Jealous about? She's a woman? This lyrics in this song are a jumbled up mess, by no means does it make sense.
"You're too sexy beautiful and everybody wants a taste, that's why"
Umm...DO  YOU EVEN KNOW THE MEANING OF JEALOUSY
"You're the only one invited, I said there's no one else for you, cause you know when I get excited(yeah). When you get jealous too."
You lustful, envious, son a bitch. Yeah the song title matches. You.....wait....she's getting jealous too?
HOW THE LIVING F*CK DOES THAT WORK.
Rude
You are the rude one, mister. When somebody says no, they say no. You're a damn hypocrite.

HOW THE LIVING F*CK DOES THAT WORK.
Rude
You are the rude one, mister. When somebody says no, they say no. You're a damn hypocrite.

replies.body:
Eh. i'm not much of a huge music fan.

But.....

If I could say the most popular song at my school this year it would be: Fancy, By Iggy Azalea. If i could say the most un popular song, it would be Anaconda. Anaconda is first off stupid, and the music is just repetitive non-sense that no one really wants to hear. Plus the whole message is really inappropriate! Honestly though My favorite songs that I listen to are all from the album "songs of innocence" by U2. They are currently my #1 band group!

replies.body:
Do you wanna kill a snowman?
Come on, let's go and slay!
I never see you anymore
Come out the door
It's like you've gone awayyy
We used to kill small creatures
And now we're not
I wish you would tell me why!
Do you wanna kill a snowman?
It doesn't have to be a snowman...

replies.body:
Best: Taylor Swift: Blank Space
         Iggy Azalea: Fancy
         Sia: Chandelier
         Tove Lo: Habits + Habits (stay high)

Worst: Mark Ronson: Uptown Funk
           Meghan Trainor: All About that Bass
           Sam Smith: Stay with Me
           Magic!: Rude

Honourable Mention: Anaconda. Love it or hate it, whenever it plays, it gets everyone pumped. Good job Nicki Minaj for making one of the most entertaining songs of the year.

Honourable Mention: AronChupa - I'm an Albatraoz. It's a fantastic song with senseless lyrics and an insane euro-pop beat over classical instruments. It wasn't big in 2014. But wait until America gets a hold of it.
replies.body_tagged:

Worst: Mark Ronson: Uptown Funk

           Sam Smith: Stay with Me
           Magic!: Rude

Honourable Mention: Anaconda. Love it or hate it, whenever it plays, it gets everyone pumped. Good job Nicki Minaj for making one of the most entertaining songs of the year.

Honourable Mention: AronChupa - I'm an Albatraoz. It's a fantastic song with senseless lyrics and an insane euro-pop beat over classical instruments. It wasn't big in 2014. But wait until America gets a hold of it.
